newsitem.title: USA: Nuko target of class action - lawyers.
newsitem.headline: Nuko target of class action - lawyers.

text.p: Lawyers representing plaintiffs said Friday they had filed a class action suit for buyers of Nuko Information Systems Inc common stock from April 24 through and including May 20.
The suit was filed in the U.S. District Court for the Northern District of California, the law firm of Goodkind Labaton Rudoff & Sucharow LLP said in a statement Friday evening.
The statement said the complaint alleges that the company disseminated false and misleading public statements about its financial results for fiscal 1997 first quarter.
Earlier this week Nuko restated its first quarter results to report a $0.37 a share loss.
No one NUKO was immediately available for comment.
